channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Nvidia’s H20 chip found itself at the center of the U.S.-China trade war
item.description: The stakes are high for Nvidia as it looks to restart China chip sales in the face of fast-evolving geopolitical tensions.

item.title: The entire stock market is being carried by these four AI stocks
item.description: Four Big Tech names have been responsible for 60% of the stock market gains this year, and the rally could keep on going.

item.title: CoreWeave’s lockup is about to expire. What that could mean for the stock.
item.description: Corporate insiders will soon be able to unload shares, which could cause some selling pressure but also ultimately reduce volatility by increasing the...

item.title: Bullish’s stock is still rallying, as the IPO market refuses to take a summer break this year
item.description: August is typically a quiet month for IPOs, but this year, Bullish, Figma and Firefly Aerospace have ignited the new-issues market.

item.title: Wholesale prices post biggest surge in three years, PPI shows, in sign of tariff-related inflation
item.description: The cost of wholesale goods and services — where rising inflation tends to show up first — in July posted the biggest increase in three years, possibl...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.
